about_the_game:
Explosively fast platforming action!

Bounce, pounce, and slide your way through fast-paced levels as Chaz, the radioactive cheetah! This retro platformer inspired by the likes of Sonic the Hedgehog and Jazz Jackrabbit features a high skill ceiling, crispy pixel art, and a bangin’ MIDI-styled soundtrack.

Chaz receives an invitation to the Lynx Kingdom’s royal banquet, but when he arrives, he discovers that the evil Edward Eagle has taken Luna the Lynx Princess hostage, and wants the entire kingdom as ransom. Our unlikely hero stumbled into the Lynx castle at just the wrong time, and with the king too scared to act, it looks like Chaz is gonna have to defuse Edward’s scheme himself.

Nuclear Cheetah combines time attack platforming with a collect-a-thon progression system. Play through and master challenging stages, earn power orbs to unlock new areas of the castle, and save the princess; all while uncovering the story of how a once mild-mannered cheetah transformed into a green gangsta who eats toxic waste for breakfast.

Have a blast zooming through levels, chill out in the castle, and save the princess, along with the entire Lynx Kingdom. But whatever you do… don’t blow up!
detailed_description:
Explosively fast platforming action!

Bounce, pounce, and slide your way through fast-paced levels as Chaz, the radioactive cheetah! This retro platformer inspired by the likes of Sonic the Hedgehog and Jazz Jackrabbit features a high skill ceiling, crispy pixel art, and a bangin’ MIDI-styled soundtrack.

Chaz receives an invitation to the Lynx Kingdom’s royal banquet, but when he arrives, he discovers that the evil Edward Eagle has taken Luna the Lynx Princess hostage, and wants the entire kingdom as ransom. Our unlikely hero stumbled into the Lynx castle at just the wrong time, and with the king too scared to act, it looks like Chaz is gonna have to defuse Edward’s scheme himself.

Nuclear Cheetah combines time attack platforming with a collect-a-thon progression system. Play through and master challenging stages, earn power orbs to unlock new areas of the castle, and save the princess; all while uncovering the story of how a once mild-mannered cheetah transformed into a green gangsta who eats toxic waste for breakfast.

Have a blast zooming through levels, chill out in the castle, and save the princess, along with the entire Lynx Kingdom. But whatever you do… don’t blow up!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11.7.10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz quad-core Intel Core i7 processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Nuclear Cheetah

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3550H / Intel Core i5-10300H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explosively fast platforming action! Bounce, pounce, and slide your way through challenging levels, and experience a unique blend of time-attack platforming and collect-a-thon progression.
